评论概述: An upgrade from a regular t-shirt!
评论详情: Pleasantly surprised with this trendy t-shirt. At this price point, I am amazed at how soft the t-shirt fabric is - has a slight stretch to it that helps it maintain a nice flattering shape at all times. I particularly like the addition of the ruffles on the sleeves - just the right amount in my opinion. I ordered the Small and the fit is spot on, so I would say that sizing runs true to size. I am 5'3", 108 lbs for reference. I plan to get a lot of wear from this top. Cannot beat the quality and style for the price!!!!

I received the shirt in wine red.  I found the photos to be very accurate as far as the color. For the price, this is a nice shirt. Still, it fits nice enough and I’ll get some use out of this shirt in the summer for work, since it can easily dress up with a nice pant.
